mapper.select: SELECT d.file_name "fileName" , sum(d.bytes/1024/1024) "total" , sum(f.bytes)/1024/1024 "free" , sum(d.bytes/1024/1024) - sum(f.bytes)/1024/1024 "used" FROM dba_data_files d, dba_free_space f WHERE d.file_id = f.file_id(+) AND d.tablespace_name = #{tablespaceName} GROUP BY d.file_name ORDER BY 1
